title: Spambase Data Set
description: Classifying Email as Spam or Non-Spam.

features.name: word_freq_make
features.description: Given 'word_freq_WORD': percentage of words in the e-mail that match WORD, i.e. 100 * (number of times the WORD appears in the e-mail) / total number of words in e-mail. A "word" in this case is any string of alphanumeric characters bounded by non-alphanumeric characters or end-of-string.

features.description: Given 'word_freq_WORD': percentage of words in the e-mail that match WORD, i.e. 100 * (number of times the WORD appears in the e-mail) / total number of words in e-mail. A "word" in this case is any string of alphanumeric characters bounded by non-alphanumeric characters or end-of-string.

features.name: char_freq_%3B
features.description: Given 'char_freq_CHAR]', percentage of characters in the e-mail that match CHAR, i.e. 100 * (number of CHAR occurences) / total characters in e-mail

features.name: char_freq_%28
features.description: Given 'char_freq_CHAR]', percentage of characters in the e-mail that match CHAR, i.e. 100 * (number of CHAR occurences) / total characters in e-mail

features.name: capital_run_length_average
features.description: average length of uninterrupted sequences of capital letters

features.name: capital_run_length_longest
features.description: length of longest uninterrupted sequence of capital letters

features.name: capital_run_length_total
features.description: total number of capital letters in the e-mail
